overview: Filmed during the 2012 Melbourne International Comedy Festival, Will Work for Laughs hears from experienced comedians like Greg Behrendt, author of He's Just Not That Into You, emerging comedy stars, like Daniel Connell and Mick Neven and successful fringe performers like Dr Brown and Slow Clap on the demands of a comedy career as well as live performances showing the artists doing what they do best.
title: Will Work For Laughs
